snippet: The ordinance requires seed companies to disclose which pesticides they use and establishes some no-spray zones.
abstract: Legislators on Hawaiian island of Kauai approve bill to restrict use of pesticides by companies developing genetically modified crops there.
lead_paragraph: The ordinance requires seed companies to disclose which pesticides they use and establishes some no-spray zones.

headline.main: Limits Approved for Genetically Modified Crops in Kauai, Hawaii
headline.print_headline: Hawaiian Island Votes to Curb Pesticide Use
